meanings.sent1: The teacher reteaches the lesson to help the student understand better.
meanings.sent2: She reteaches the dance moves to the class after they forget.
meanings.sent3: The robot reteaches the dance steps, but this time, it adds a funny twist.
meanings.sent4: Life often reteaches us the same lessons until we finally learn.
meanings.sent5: The wise old owl reteaches the young birds how to fly with patience and care.

meanings.definition: To provide instruction or guidance again.
meanings.sent1: The coach reteaches the soccer strategy to the team for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent2: He reteaches the safety rules to the children to ensure they remember.
meanings.sent3: The magician reteaches the card trick, but this time, he adds a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: Experience often reteaches us the importance of being prepared.
meanings.sent5: The mentor reteaches the valuable life lessons to the young adults with enthusiasm.
